product_name: Spy Farrah Sunglasses - Femme Fatale Frame - Women's
long_description: The women's oversize Farrah Sunglasses from Spy pair a Femme Fatale frame with premium lenses for great style and performance. Bronze fade polycarbonate lenses block 100% of harmful UV rays and are highly impact-resistant. Lightweight Propionate frames allow for an even, comfortable weight distribution across the nose. Modified-wrap 8-base lenses provide some eye protection from the sides. Farrah Sunglasses in a Spy Femme Fatale frame look striking on faces of all shapes and sizes.
short_description: The women's oversize Farrah Sunglasses from Spy pair a Femme Fatale frame with premium lenses for great style and performance.
